name: Greg's Emporium
description:
Greg's Emporium is a unique horror game that definitely doesn't have any relation to FNAF!

This game is a virtual experience, allowing you to enjoy Greg's Emporium at home like never before! With the hyper-realistic scares and hopeful absence of Carlson, you are sure to have a fun time!

At Greg's Emporium, you will find:

  • 10 different entities that will chase you down!
  • 7 different nights to choose from, each with a unique map and idea!
  • Custom night bringing tons of replayability & experimentation with it's large amount of modifiers and preset selection!
  • Collectable flashlights with different stats and rarities!
  • Different items to collect during your run that may increase your chances of survival!
  • Soundtrack of 11 different songs!

With free movement, sprinting, crouching, and possibly teleportation at your command, there are so many ways to survive the nights! Want to avoid confrontation? Hide in lockers and sneak on by! Have good hearing? Place down some Noiseboxes and listen to their footsteps! Decide it's time to run? That's a great idea! 

NOTE: This game relies heavily on sound. Although everything is possible without sound, sound is highly recommended.
